requirements.summary: Adjust Image Resize mode tab styling so the "Target Size" tab uses a distinct background color style (especially when active) while keeping labels and behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Image Resize options UI, the tab labeled "Target Size" has a visibly different background color style than the other two tabs (at minimum when selected/active).
The tab labels remain in English exactly as: "By Pixels", "By Percentage", and "Target Size".
Only the styling of the tabs is changed; resize behavior and validation logic remain unchanged.

file_operations.description: Update the Tailwind className styling applied to the TabsTrigger for value="target-size" so its active-state background color (and complementary text/border styling if needed for contrast) is different from the "pixels" and "percentage" triggers; do not change tab labels, mode values, or any validation/processing logic, and do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
